questions: Are there shops on the left in the image?
Are there shops on the right in the image?
Does the image present a comparison logic: shops on the left are livelier than shops on the right?
model_output:
Yes, there are shops on the left in the image; I can see shop windows and products displayed inside them.
Yes, there are shops on the right in the image; I can see similar shop windows and products displayed.
No, the image does not present a comparison logic: shops on the left are livelier than shops on the right; both sides appear equally illuminated and active.
